attributes.review: I log on and all of the sudden the app made my grandma fall down the stairs. My grandma has been in the hospital for 3 weeks because of this app. I do not recommend unless you want your grandma DEAD💀. thank you
attributes.title: disgusted with this app

attributes.review: I was really looking to download this app to see how Trump made america great again but when I downloaded it all I could see is how he made it worse. False advertising.
attributes.title: Lack of Important Features

attributes.review: So I got this app thinking it would be all fine and dandy and then it turns out it’s supporting a racist homophobic pedo basketball?? Ummm, no thank you. And here I was thinking the Republican Party had standards 🧚🧚🥰🥰🌼🌼🌾.... oops. Too bad 😉😉🌿🌿🙌🏼. Vote for Biden pplz.
attributes.title: Plz build a wall around this app. And make Trump pay for it

attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible first it was an advertisement for a Cheeto puff and now the cia is braking in my house and trying to take away my pet ostrich like what the heck do not download this app actually downloaded this app and give it a one star 🤬
attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.review: This app runs like a nightmare and doesn’t make any sense and constantly crashes, sometimes even before I can even click anything!! Worst app I have ever downloaded.
attributes.title: Hideous and Terrible App

attributes.review: I just don’t like it at all I first see a man trying to become an orange like... what? I’m very confused as to what is going on here then I see that it says keep America great ? Ummm sirrr we are in a middle of a pandemic and it’s not so great WORSE APP TO EVER EXIST
attributes.title: I don’t wanna see a T on my phone😤

attributes.review: This app is such a scam I thought that it was just going to be a political app, but NO. I noticed that every day it scams like $30 out of my bank account. It just takes the money. DO NOT GET THIS APP. It will take all your money from you.
attributes.title: SCAMS YOU SO HARD

attributes.review: This app is awfully confusing. I struggled using it the whole time I had it. So much wasn’t working when I tried to use it. 0/10 recommend. Would rate a 0 if possible.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I am baffled at how bad this app is like words cannot even describe how awful this app is I don’t even want to write a long review it’s so bad. I would rather write an entire essay about the definition of racism then write a full paragraph for this.
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: this app is absolutely horrendous! I cannot even fathom having someone else downloading this app because of what it has done to me 😥 I was followed home, and it was day light then some man wearing a MAGA hat came and attached me 😭Thank god some kind woman helped me get away !!
attributes.title: NO FLAVOR
